text: Très bon rapport qualité/prix, service courtois, et plusieurs items plus créatifs que dans bien des restos à sushis.
This is now my favorite place to eat in St. Jean Sur Richelieu. The food was great the service was great. I will definitely be dining here often.
J'adore venir manger ici, la nourriture est bonne l'équipe est agréable et à l'écoute de vos besoins.  Ambiance Lounge j'adore

J'ai été à quelques endroits du même genre et si je compare, je suis un peu déçu. L'endroit est bien décoré et nous avons bien été reçu. Le service est rapide et nos repas sont préparés devant nous, derrière le comptoir de service. Par contre, le rapport qualité prix n'est pas présent. Pour la quantité de sushi que j'avais commandé, le goût et le prix, je trouvais que les sushi n'étaient pas top top. Je ne dis pas que ce n'était pas bon, mais pour le prix, je trouve qu'il y a un arrière goût qui me reste en bouche.

My wife and I took a shot on Masako Plus because it had some excellent reviews online.  I can definitively say that the 4.5 and 5 star reviews were on the money.  We ordered Beef Sashimi in citrus and soy sauce as an appetizer and it is something I'll order every single time we visit.  We additionally ordered multiple house sushi rolls and each and every one was exquisite.  I highly recommend this restaurant, and my wife stated numerous times that she felt like it was a place we would revisit on our trips north of the border.  The atmosphere was softly lit, with the light hum of conversation in the background.  The waitstaff were fantastic, and spoke English as well as French (which was a bonus for me as an anglophone).  The menus were in English and French - and we were asked by the waitstaff what language was more comfortable for us to be addressed in.  It was a wholly fantastic dining experience, and we made sure to visit the chef/proprietress to let her know about our positive experience.  Absolutely visit this sushi restaurant if you are in St. Jean!
